dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 4414 IH: Satellite-Based Agricultural Data Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Pettersen (for herself and Mr. Moolenaar) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To include commercial weather services as a priority area for funding under the Agriculture and Food Research Initiative of the Department of Agriculture, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Satellite-Based Agricultural Data Act.

section.header: Inclusion of commercial weather as AFRI priority area
section.text: Subsection (b)(2)(E)(iii) of the Competitive, Special, and Facilities Research Grant Act (7 U.S.C. 3157(b)(2)(E)(iii)) is amended by inserting , including through the use of data and tools available from commercial weather services after mitigation measures.
